h1: Moolya’s AI-First Approach to Product Engineering

blocks.text: Moolya’s AI-First Approach to Product Engineering

list:  Reduce time-to-market by 30%-50% with Agile methodologies and rapid prototyping  Impact: Launching faster can lead to $500k$1M in additional annual revenue.
Improved Product Quality
 40%-60% fewer defects through rigorous automated testing and QA processes
 Impact: Enhanced product stability reduces
maintenance costs by $200k-$500k annually.
Optimized Costs
 Lean team structures and automation reduce development and operational costs by 20%-30%
 Impact: Save $300k-$800k yearly on staffing and infrastructure expenses.
Enhanced Collaboration
 Bridge gaps between development and operations teams, improving efficiency by 50%-70%
 Impact: Free up resources for innovation, saving $300k-$1M annually.

list: India's leading e-commerce platform revolutionizing online shopping.
Impact: Collaboration with Moolya since August 2012.
Streamlined Agile Processes: Improved sprint cycles, reduced backlogs, and faster on-call issue resolution.
Localization Excellence: Enabled platform localization in 9 languages, increasing accessibility for tier-2, tier-3 cities, and rural areas.
Optimized Release Pipelines: Ensured timely feature releases and automated Cl/CD pipelines, minimizing downtime.
Faster Go-to-Market: Accelerated feature launches with confidence.
Scalability: Supported 1.6 million user hits per second during Big Billion Days.

p: A supply chain and sustainability management platform designed to cater to fashion brands in the European Union (EU) markets.
list: Configurable Frontend Implementation: Transitioned from a conventional frontend to a configuration-driven frontend, enhancing flexibility and scalability.
Enhanced Data Collection Platform: Developed an improved platform to facilitate seamless customer data collection for fashion brands.
Efficiency Boost: Reduced development time by 50%, accelerating feature rollout and platform updates.
User-Friendly Data Collection: Enabled brands to collect customer data through a more intuitive and user-centric platform.
Geographical Compliance Made Simple: Assisted fashion brands in adhering to EU geographical compliance regulations with ease and efficiency.

h1: Accelerating Scalable Engineering for Real Estate ERP
list: Audit & Stabilization l000+ lines across frontend, backend & infra.
12+ ERP & marketplace modules improved (web/mobile)
Test Automation & DevOps 80% coverage, 40% faster deployment cycles.
Unified fragmented modules under a single architecture
Delivered 6+ critical modules for 12-week roadmap
Built for scale, speed & multi-user journeys (admin, vendor, buyer)
2-week takeover with audit & roadmap aligned to business goals
Resolved 60+ high-impact ERP issues (Tasks, Procurement, Sales, Finance)
Delivered Marketplace, Admin Panel & Homebuyer Portal for GTM
Integrated 5+ external services (payments, GPS, analytics, etc.)
Enabled QA via Bugasura; addressed 200+ test scenarios
